desc: This course offers an introduction to speaking, reading, and writing Chinese, as well as mastery of basic grammar and command of 500 characters for reading and writing. Class meets four times weekly. Individual language laboratory visits are also required. Prerequisite: Chinese 111 or equivalent. Offered annually in the spring semester.
notes: Students in Chin 112B must also register for one lab Chin 112 AL, BL, or CL.
title: Beginning Chinese II
